item.description:
Seaside Afternoon Hike

Sunday, Oct., 16th. 1pm. to 3pm.

Ordione State Park

rt. 1, Rye NH., 03870

The boat ramp, not the main entrance.

A Dog & Child Friendly Event.

Rain, cold, heavy winds, cancel this events.

Host: Steve Obermiller ( Steve O ) 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

Carpooling from Nashua and Manchester

Steve O. wrote:

        Bring your friends, dogs, kids, and join me for a good walk, along the sea. We will meet at 1 pm., at the boat ramp, for an easy 2 hour hike around Ordione Point. This is the opening to Portsmouth Harbor.  Where there are trails along the sea and through the historical sites.  Afterward, if people would like to get something to eat?  We can go down route 1, and sit by the sea and have dinner or drinks.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Seaside Afternoon Hike
